name: Aaron the Nomad
text: Blank is simply a cozy coffee shop that has great vibes. It is the perfect place to get a Quick coffee or just sit and do some reading. The environment is calm, peaceful, and always has some classic tunes playing.

name: Spencer Williams
text: Loved it! I was visiting from out of town and needed a place to chill. The two staff I met were super friendly and cool, they let us play board games while we hung out. Food options are limited to muffins, but they have a decent drink selection. Small comic and record selection, but a really awesome place.

resp.text: Out of towners are our favorites. You guys get it! We get you, too.

name: Andrea Lindholm
text: Keishun is wonderful and makes an excellent cup of coffee! Love it.

name: Jay B
text: Interesting collection of things being sold in the shop. Nice little place. I think a weekly group was there playing d&d at the only table in the shop. We ordered our drinks and left.

name: Chris West
text: I love the shop. Totally cool retro look. Love the patio area out back. The guys that run the store are great to talk to and know what they are talking about when it comes to comics and anything else they sell. They are super nice guys.

name: Timothy Green
text:
Came in for a coffee. Server who was going to prepare my drink wiped his nose audibly across his open palm while waiting at the register for my order. Gross. Hard pass.

Update: Check out the Owner's response to this review. Just lovely. I never ordered btw, just excused myself politely and left. Find coffee elsewhere mates! Ye be warned.

resp.text: I prefer to give people an OPPORTUNITY to wash their hands before PREPARING my beverage. Otherwise my daily triggering isn't as fair as the safe place Im constantly demanding.  Those computer screens, along with cash and cards are much grosser that you'd think. Washing hands before TAKING the order just creates the need to wash them again. We wash hands 100% of the time before making ANY beverages. ALWAYS HAVE AND ALWAYS WILL. But yeah, that's gross, and probably embarrassing to the guy attempting to take your order. Downright deplorable. You know that feeling right?  We've all been there and it ALWAYS happens at the worst possible time.  What matters though, really, is the recovery. I hate that you had to leave so abruptly though, as you missed the part where he washed his hands before preparing the drink you ordered. It was good too. I know because I drank it. We love you either way. Even when we don't meet your expectations. We will put your feedback to good use and make it a learning experience.  It is our mission to look to the past and improve the future!!

name: Scot McKinney
text: Super customer service, great coffee, awesome selection of records and comics. A great place to shop and hangout, plus the patio is sweet!

name: N Flippo
text: If the city of Florence was a store, this would be it... Great coffee and drinks (try the coffee milkshake), a varied collection of comics as well they are willing to order for you if they don't have something, and vinyl records from vintage to new. Definitely stop by to grab a drink and browse or sit on the back patio!

resp.text: Word is bond

name: Will Mitchell (Captain Will)
text: I may visit others, but this is MY comic shop.  It's a small place because they've just got started, but the folks are great, and so is the coffee.  There's lots of vinyl records, if you're into that sort of thing.  My wife and I stop in at least once a week, and they're making comic collectors out of the both of us!

name: Tiffany Kilburn
text: Absolutely amazing caramel macchiato, (not overly sweet like Starbucks) Patrick was very friendly and informative. Lovely Patio to just chill while enjoying your coffee. Will definitely be a added delight to my normal routine.

resp.text: We appreciate your kind words Tiffany!

name: Toni Serpa
text: Not a lot of anything it states in its name, but more than you'll find anywhere else around for hours. Record selection is minimal, comic selection is mostly newer items, and coffee wasn't half bad!

resp.text: Love It!!! Not half bad.

name: Ashley Harris
text: Great coffee with lots of flavor! Nice to see another local coffee shop. Plus there's plenty to look at, books and board games for hanging out, and you can do your music/comic shopping all in one stop!

name: Chicknwings
text: I've been coming here for over a month now, and absolutely love the environment and variety they offer.

resp.text: Thank you Chicknwings. We work hard to provide a unique environment and experience. Also, we really love chicken wings. So by default, we really love you!

name: Spencer Lane
text: Love this little shop. Staff are always welcoming and talkative. Vinyls, comic books, and coffee. Nothing bad about it.

name: Penny Queen
text: Good music, nice people, very quiet and peaceful.

resp.text: The BEST music! We try as much as we can to specialize in local, regional, and projects tied to the Shoals area. Also harder to find, exclusive, limited edition records, along with lots of under the radar stuff.  Thanks for your support!

name: Todd Beene
text: Fantastic locally owned comic, music, and coffee spot. The backyard is a crucial hang. Get some coffee, buy something, and spend some time out back for a great day.

name: ubermonkeyking
text: This is the best comic shop we have in this area. Guys are great and love their smoothies.

name: Andrew Lewis
text: Great selection of coffee, comics, and music including vinyl.  Nice patio to relax at.  Support your local record store!

name: Max Tew
text: Great coffee, great music, great staff. If you're looking for a place to work quietly, to talk to a stranger, or to just sit in a cozy room and enjoy a nice cup of coffee, this is the place.

name: Philip Gambrell
text: They have an amazing selection of records, books, tapes, comics, and CDs. Their coffee and smoothies are amazing, and the people are amazingly nice.

resp.text: Thank you, again and again.

name: QuaLude Cage
text: As always Great time with some awesome comics and sweet surrounding

name: Ray Martinez
text: Good comics selection. Fair prices. Nice clean store.

name: Callie White
text: Friendly employees, all very knowledgeable about music and comics. This is where I always go for new music and comic book releases.

name: Tim Elam
text: Great place to grab a cup of coffee and shop for a new comic book or vinyl record. Nice selection of books, music, and accessories.

name: June Howard Barr
text: Such a neat place. Coffee is probably my favorite in florence. The staff is so nice and the selection of records is great!

name: Steve Patterson
text: Super place to enjoy a great cup of coffee and shop for vantage records, t shirts and comic books.

name: Beautiful Noise Vinyl And Gaming Clips
text: This place is great and the owner is very friendly and knowledgeable about his products if you're in the Florence area this is your go to stop for harder to find records especially if you're into indie music

name: Michael Smith
text: Love it!

name: Jared Wallin
text: Cool little comic shop / record store / coffee bar all in one.

name: Pokeypuppy 105
text: Cleanliness and service isn't the best, but it is a neat experience for someone into comics

resp.text: Ouch. We've maintained a 99% Health Rating since day one.  Both owners have over 30 years combined in service industry management.  I'm curious if you ever gave us an opportunity to resolve your service issue before sharing it with the world?  Things happen and when they do we ALWAYS go above and beyond to make it right. Thank you for your feedback. We will continue to do our best!

name: Will Burhans
text: Nice store, great variety of drinks. Nice atmosphere.

name: Yolande Webster (Kabiu)
text: Nice comic book store.  Lots of selection.

resp.text: Thanks so much Yolande.  As a growth opportunity, how could we have earned that extra 🌟?

name: Jason Sassin
text: Great store with great owner and employees. Always a pleasure.

name: Brian Dunaway
text: Really cool place. Great selection and great staff.

name: John Tipler
text: I think they stopped carrying comics. Maybe they were going out of business? 🤔 Maybe.

name: Jeremy Woods
text: Great coffee. Great record selection. Great vibe.

name: Leslie Brown
text: Quaint local place! Vinyl and comic book junkies should totally check it out!

name: Lisa Evans The Fam
text: Great atmosphere , and very polite and respectful people working here.

resp.text: Lisa, we appreciate your kind words and value your business!!  For exclusive deals available only to regular customers, sign up for our newsletters through the "contact" page of our website @ www.blankcoffeecomicsrecords.com

name: Scott Norris
text: Perfect service and fun atmosphere

resp.text: That's the goal, at least. Must've caught us on a good day.

name: Joseph Brown
text: A cool little place to get your music and coffee

name: DC Roman
text: Coffe is pricey, but its good.

resp.text: We're glad you enjoyed the coffee. We try hard to keep our prices competitive, as they are the same, or lower, than the other local options. Unfortunately, artisan coffees are just plain expensive.  Next time ask about our loyalty program, where every 7th drink is free. Thank you for stopping in.

name: Pruitt Holcombe
text: Good coffee, good smoothies, great comics and great staff!

name: Kim Santos
text: Excellent Coffee. Relaxed atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Cody H
text: Really awesome place with great vibes.

name: Jeremy Cravens
text: Love this place!

name: gamerguyAJ
text: Very cool place

name: Brian Schweighardt
text: Great place for vinyl comics and coffee.

resp.text: We appreciate your business!

name: Dylan Hodges
text: The people there were so nice

resp.text: Glad to know we're keeping it together, at least during hours of operation. We are a mess IRL.

name: C M Hughes
text: Great little comic book store

resp.text: Who you calling little?!?! But seriously; little store, big heart, and mediocre work ethic.

name: Cody Haithcock
text: Great place will be there again

name: Dustin Coan
text: Great little comic book and record store!

name: Hunter Parrish
text: Great shop, owners are super nice

resp.text: We think you're super nice too! Thanks.

name: Joey Turnage
text: Great shop with great people!

resp.text: Thank you, but as people we are seriously flawed. Every day we remain open is a miracle because those popular stereotypes about comic nerds and music snobs couldn't be more true. What we do have, however, are great customers.

name: Mary Cook
text: Very trendy, cute shop, great selection of comics

name: Brian Cameron
text: Good comic and record collection.

resp.text: Brian, thanks for the props! Better to respond late than never, right? We add dozens of rare and highly collectible records every week. For exclusive dscounts through our customer newsletter, contact us at www.blankccr.com

name: Kyle Jackson
text: K I yuug

name: mike wallace
text: Comic books, used albums, coffee and live music. what more could you want

name: Shiela Jarvis
text: Just went there to pick up something I had ordered, realized it was the office where I used to work. Very nice and accommodating guy allowed me to walk around.

name: Nigel Mongerie
text: Finally

name: NickelK
text: Everyone there was friendly, and shoutout to the dude that was working on an infinite cheeseburger machine on modded minecraft.

name: Nicole Smith
text: My favorite place to be! Great food, great people, great business! It's very much about community and after becoming a regular member, I'm also becoming a better person. You really get to know people here on a personal level that actually care about your well being. This is a business where you're not just a number to them.

name: Mr Loyal
text: I only walked around for a little bit, met the owner and really enjoyed the tour he gave. Im only rating 4 stars for now because my visit was very brief, future visits will likely merit the final star. The environment was very cozy and welcoming and i cant wait to visit on a day where i actually have time to hang out!

name: Hydro Coldwater
text: I saw Ed Sheeran there once

name: Gabriel Galindo
text: Best place to hang out and be yourself with others just like you! Great Staff and best food in Opelika by far offered in a public place. Always enjoyed my time there and so will everyone else!

name: Victoria Mystic
text: A safe, comfy, and fun home away from home at any hour. With great staff and chill people.. Oh! And a great menu too!

name: dnwaffo
text: gaming cafe and eatery with a nice assortment of games to choose from. Great , chill environment for hardcore and casual gamers

name: J Walters
text: Fantastic little place with all the video games you could ever want and hope to dream for. The owner is a fantastic guy that will show you around and have you meet some of the regulars. Food is always super tasty and with the craziest but best ideas for milkshakes (which apparently is bottomless for members!)

name: William Whitesides
text: Finally visited this place after months of meaning to. Outstanding atmosphere. The lady at the front showed me around to all the rooms available and even introduced me to one of the main D&D members. Everyone is super friendly and it's easily a place you should visit if you love video games, anime, or tabletop games.

name: Frank Dillman
text: Dude...This place is dope!!! They have all kinds of games and stuff here. Vintage games, new games, online gaming, tournaments, lots of trash talking (friendly), lots of fun yelling, a resident dog, sloppy cheeseburgers (the best kind), chips, popcorn, drinks...and it's not expensive at all. I drive 45 minutes, one way, to drop off my son or stay and play with my kids there. It's the best entertainment deal on the planet! No kidding or exaggerating!

name: Zoe Hughes
text: The staff are helpful and polite. There is a bank of computers so there are no long queues. The cafe offers a selection of food and drinks for customers at a good price.

name: Hali McGee
text: I'm a community Leader for the cafe and I love it! Great food and people! The owners are close friends of mine and are very welcoming!

name: West Zostin
text: If you're looking for a friendly, accepting, open diverse and extremely fun tasty you'll never want to leave then this is the place for you. There's a vast variety of games. Both competitive and just for fun play isn't an issue. I loved it 👍

name: Jordan Walters
text:
This is easily my favorite place to go to in the Auburn/Opelika area. They have all the gaming systems I could ever want, a huge library of games, LARPing, D&D, and some really delicious food.

The prices are fantastic too, especially considering the amount of food you get. Oh and those milkshakes. Just get one and thank me later.

Owners are some really down to earth and personable people. Really love this place and have made so many new friends here, I can't believe we haven't had a place like this here sooner.

name: Maddie Brown
text: It's a great place to hang out and make new friends. They have great food and even greater prices. They have a ton of video games and board games. It's a super welcoming and friendly environment to spend your extra hours.

name: Carlyyy Shay
text: Great place for people looking for something different than the basic bar scene. Amazing, will definitely go again.

name: The Monday Channel
text: The best gaming cafe in town!

name: Rainbow Grahamcrackers
text: The owners and customer base are all really friendly! Wide selection of games to play and p0wn your friends at. (Or get p0wn'd yourself, heh.) Also their food is great. Good selection even for someone like me with Celiac. I super recommend their milkshakes!

name: Orin Spurlin
text: Good place to chill and make friends. If you want it they have it. And the food is amazing.

name: Tee Diddle
text: Super friendly atmosphere, very great place to hang out with friends! Lots of cool games and retro games too. The milkshakes are surprisingly delicious too

name: Sean Squiers
text: Love it, I usually go there once a week, great friendly environment.

name: joshua kendrick
text: A great place to hang out for everyone from the casual board gamer to the professional tournament players. Definitely worth a visit whenever you have a chance!

name: Justin Carter
text: Great place to go hangout and play some games. Events, tournaments, and great food... Check it out, you won't regret it.

name: Anna Gautney
text: The owners are extremely friendly and made my son, his friend, and I feel at home. We will definitely go back!

name: Shepard Skywalker
text: A++ Great place😁😅😉😆🤗

name: Tonee Dragon
text: Best place in downtown Opelika!

name: Joey Stuart
text: The owners are incredible people, do everything in their ability to make sure everyone is happy and catered to. Lots of options for playing games available, with the most popular titles

name: Handsome Jack
text: A chill place to sit back and relax. Wide selection of food and snacks, as well as games. Staff is friendly and polite.

name: Lovely vibes
text: I love it here! I feel right at home! Nerdy everything~

name: Khalil Moss
text: THIS IS BY FAR THE BEST PLACE IVE EVER SPENT ANY OF MY TIME. I ENJOY EVERY MINUTE SPENT HERE AND WOULD LOVE TO SPEND A TON MORE TIME!

resp.text: we're always glad to have you. You are very valuable to the community and a lot of people really love hanging out with you. You're really comical and you're getting to be a really great smash player. I to have you here for many years to come! =)

name: S1y Raccoon (Kbow199)
text: Best place in Auburn/ Opelika for anyone who likes anime, gaming and food. Chill environment filled with cool people.

name: Amy Lowery
text: My nephew loves this place! The staff are so nice and friendly.

name: Christopher Jackson
text: Friendly staff, cool environment and an over great time. Strongly recommend for any gamer.

name: William Scarborough
text: Excellent service with a wonderful staff. All consoles and video games abailable. The best place in opelika to get your games on with some friends, or meet new ones.

name: Clue Facts
text: I've been wanting to play sega genesis and Atari for a while. They have both a decent collection of games.

name: robert rawlinson
text: Great place to go you can play anything from D&D and Atari to Xbox one and PlayStation 4 😁

resp.text: Thanks for letting the world know how awesome we are. it's always a fun time to hang out with you and You make the community more comfortable and welcomed.

name: Spencer Sumner
text:
NERDtorch cafe is the next big thing for Opelika/Auburn and people that love video games, anime, and all things nerd culture. Nigel and Leilani run the store and are two of my favorite people. They get to know their customers very well and it makes the atmosphere feel like you're walking in to a good friends house to play the day away with some Smash Bros or Halo.

Leilani makes the best tacos I have ever had in my life. If you get the chance, go to Taco Tuesday. You won't regret it. In fact all the food is delicious. An order of double fries or nachos goes perfect with a D&D session.

Nigel has the uncanny ability to bring fun wherever he goes. He's set up the cafe to accommodate nearly any genre of nerd from retro gamers to hardcore tournament competitors. He's also constantly working to improve his business and make sure everyone that walks in the door has a great time. He also runs a pretty dope YouTube channel called Nerd Torch TV.

The store is organized and managed extremely well. There are several rooms dedicated to different types of gaming. There is a room for tabletop games, another for rhythm games like Guitar Hero or DDR, and other rooms dedicated to console games. There's even a PC built for gaming. Multiplayer games are very popular and this is a great place to find people that love to play Smash. I don't think I've ever been to the cafe when there wasn't someone playing Smash or Mario Cart. There's a great community built up around the cafe as well. All of the cafe members are invited to a GroupMe chat where you can get updates on events or just chat and hang out. This year, they organized a secret santa for everyone.

If you love games, nerds, and having a good time then you won't be dissapointed if drop by NERDtorch Cafe.

resp.text: Thanks so much for writing such a detailed description of NERDtorch Cafe! It means a lot that you would go to such efforts to show your appreciation like this. I'm glad we have you in our community and I know you'll keep making D&D nights awesome.

name: MORTEX YUCA
text: If you like video games, comic books, anime, mtg, Pokémon, or milkshakes this is the place for you.

name: Michael Barren
text: Where has this place been all my life??? It has it all anime, video games, and food (Taco Tuesday is the bomb diggidy!!!)

name: Jamal Core
text: It is so fun

name: Mr Genji-main
text: I thought Kurt Cobain Had The Right Idea Until I came here

name: Terrie Stinson
text: My Son Loves this place..

name: Nigel Mongerie
text: This place is so awesome

name: Nigel Mongerie
text: Finally

name: Olujimi Popoola
text: Food is a bit too expensive, and the place is a bit too cramped, but nice place to meet new people overall.

name: Jeremy Kendrick
text: This place is like a second home to me

name: Olujimi Popoola
text: Food is a bit too expensive, and the place is a bit too cramped, but nice place to meet new people overall.

name: random snit
text: I come here every day.
